subject: Coaches and Managers
Colleges and Universities
Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Penn State community went into a state of mourning after Joe Paterno, the football coach from 1966 until 2011, died Sunday morning from lung cancer.
snippet: The Penn State community went into a state of mourning after Joe Paterno, the football coach from 1966 until 2011, died Sunday morning from lung cancer.
